meanings.sent1: The undulant waves gently rocked the boat.
meanings.sent2: The undulant pattern on the fabric resembled rolling hills.
meanings.sent3: The undulant dance of the flames in the fireplace mesmerized the children.
meanings.sent4: The undulant melody of the music filled the room with a soothing rhythm.
meanings.sent5: The undulant movement of the snake was both graceful and hypnotic.

meanings.definition: Having a rising and falling motion or appearance.
meanings.sent1: The undulant hills in the distance seemed to breathe with life.
meanings.sent2: The undulant motion of the flag caught the wind's playful dance.
meanings.sent3: The undulant laughter of the baby brought joy to the whole room.
meanings.sent4: The undulant road ahead twisted and turned like a serpent in the sun.
meanings.sent5: The undulant clouds rolled across the sky, casting shadows on the fields below.
